snippet: The young Islanders surprised many by reaching the playoffs for the first time since 2007, but next season will bring fresh challenges, primarily from the N.H.L.’s realignment.
abstract: New York Islanders young team surprised many by reaching NHL playoffs for the first time since 2007, but next season will bring fresh challenges, primarily from league's realignment; Islanders pledge to build on breakout season.
lead_paragraph: The young Islanders surprised many by reaching the playoffs for the first time since 2007, but next season will bring fresh challenges, primarily from the N.H.L.’s realignment.

headline.seo: Pleased by Effort, if Not Ending, Islanders Pledge to Build on a Breakout Season
headline.main: Pleased by Effort, if Not by Ending, Isles Pledge to Build on a Breakout Season
headline.print_headline: Pleased by Effort, if Not by Ending, Isles Pledge to Build On a Breakout Season
